website_summaries.verdict: These traditional-style earmuffs keep your ears warm and prevent embarrassing hat hair malfunctions.
pros: Plush knitted ultra-soft earmuffs with plastic durable frames
Fits older youth and smaller adults
Available in a variety of colors
Can be worn with beanies, hats, glasses, and helmets
cons: Do not fold up to fit in a pocket

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect Earmuffs!!! ❄️
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these earmuffs! First of all, they fit me perfect! (2nd)SUPER cute and (3rd), they are comfortable and warm! I am very happy after looking for some on various stores and other websites.
customer_reviews.author: Silvi81

customer_reviews.title: Small- Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This earmuffs are way cute, but are sized more for a child, pre-teen. A little too small than I would like it. EDIT After making my initial review, the sell contacted me and gave me a full refund. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: kirstie

customer_reviews.title: Wicked Precious Fluffy Little Earmuffs...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my Goodness - these earmuffs are precious!!! I bought these as a gift for my mother with a matching fur hand muff and some Swarovski clear stone earrings for the Holidays. My mother loves ice skating and she is going to be the most classy skater on the ice this winter. The cute factor with these earmuffs is off the chart. I'll update this post later with a performance rating. The worst thing ever is having cold ears and we are already seeing super low temps in New England. Christmas can't come soon enough!
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy K.

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm in the Windy City!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cute and fashionable ear muffs. I was going to Chicago and wanted to be prepared for the harsh cold windy weather. Everyone warned me make sure you keep your ears warm. Took the river cruise in Chicago and used these ear muffs and thank goodness I had it because aside from my gloves these muffs made me enjoy the tour without freezing too much. It fit well and was snug but not too tight. It was comfortable to wear. Affordable and great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Monti

customer_reviews.title: Child's or Adult's?
customer_reviews.text: They fit a bit tight but they are warm and snug which is what I wanted. Not sure if they are a girls size or an adult size. Web page said "woman's" but the billing said "girls" so they be tight because they were actually sized for a child. In any case, as a small adult, they fit me ok. Like the grey color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how there are so many positive reviews on this item. The inside is made out of hard plastic in the shape of a hollow bowl which is also too big and that pokes out really bad. So weird. There's not even good padding. I have never seen ear muffs with hard plastic interior. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Howard S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a young lady
customer_reviews.text: The MOST perfect sized earmuffs that I've been able to find on Amazon. I ordered two others in the past that had muffs practically as big as my head. It really put me off wearing them in public. But these are the perfect size, small but enough to cover my ears and do their job (and I'm a 23 year old female). The muffs are flatter on the inside where they cover your ears (might seem stupid to point that out, but some earmuffs are just round ALL the way around) and soft, and just all around perfect. I just WISH SO HARD that they came in all black! I have to settle for black with white fur. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: I love these earmuffs. I was worried about ordering them online, I was afraid that since I could not feel them first that the inner part would be too hard and hurt my ears; luckily though they do not. These are so soft, they keep my ears toasty and they adjust!
customer_reviews.author: Ami Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 10 min of wear
customer_reviews.text: Very upset! The white material on the earmuffs keeps coming off and flys into my eyes. It’s already ripped and the bare bar is showing through! PLUS there was something rattling inside them when they got to me. I don’t have time to return them so now I’m stuck with a broken product. I literally wore them once! I need a warm pair of earmuffs as it’s cold and bought these to help. I just wasted money as they sent me a defected product.
customer_reviews.author: miranda22

customer_reviews.title: Very hard and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for these since they looked so soft. They are not! They "fur" is scratchy. I wore these for 3 minutes and they began to hurt. Even after extending the earmuffs, they still hurt my ears. When you feel the "fuzzy" part, underneath feels like a hard plastic. These are very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Cute earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Not adjustable but good one size fits all. I wear my hair in a pony tail or bun most days and hats don't really work well with that, this is a great alternative for the chilly winter months.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.F

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for those who do NOT want to mess their ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for those who do NOT want to mess their hair up in cold weather. They're a bit tight and squeezed my ears a little but I'm attributing that to them being brand new. They kept my ears warm on a recent trip to RI, and here during my evening walks. Good value for the expense
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one for me, one for my daughter. She has yet to try them but for me, I don't care for them. They don't "hug" your ears as I was hoping they just kind of "lay" on top... and the "fuzz" on the inside does nothing but irritate by tickling the inside of your ears. So you are taking them off all the time to scratch your ears because of the tickling.
customer_reviews.author: Centrailia

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable. For the first time this winter I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Very warm, very comfortable. For the first time this winter I was able to walk to my office comfortably, as the wind wasn't whistling past my ears. The ONLY reason I gave them 4 stars instead of 5 is because the ear cover doesn't fold into the headband, so it won't fit in my coat pocket. If they did that, they would be absolute perfection. Since I can't put them in my pocket, I just hang them around the hanger my coat is on. The ear covering though is so soft and comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: The black circle in the middle of each muff is not portrayed in the picture
customer_reviews.text: All you see in the picture is the black headband. The muff has a black circle on each side of the headband, which I personally do not like. However, they are warm and I wear them in the yard. So, 5 stars for the all white ones; 3 for the white with black headband and black muffs.
customer_reviews.author: Anna K

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love
customer_reviews.text: Love these muffs. They are comfy and cute. Overall really good quality for the price. Sometimes people laugh at me... But hey ear muffs aren't just for kids!! I think they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tine bop

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so are my ears.
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely, feels comfortable and warm. When I received I wore them for a couple of hours to see if they were going to pinch my head they did not, usually any kind of headband give me a headache after awhile. Buy these you will not be sorry. Oh did I say how cute they are?
customer_reviews.author: B. Triggs

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE! SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these ear muffs, they are exactly what I was looking for! They are so cute and comfortable, and stay on/fit well. They are mildly adjustable with how much you want to expand the headband part, but they unfortunately do not collapse and fold together as some other ear muffs I have seen online. Either way, I love them! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: This makes you sneeze
customer_reviews.text: I was not a fan of these. I returned it as soon as I received this. It sheds SO much. I was sneezing like crazy when I opened the package. I wanted to love it, but the amount of white fluff that floats in the air is super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: My tiny, 91 year old Mom needed ear muffs that would be soft, with full coverage from the cold. She can’t wear ear “bags,” and needed something that would “stay put” on her head. These are perfect, and of equal quality and value to more expensive alternatives!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Earmuffs!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a week or two ago and love them. Best pair of earmuffs I've owned. The adjustable headband is a really unexpectedly nice feature- allows you to adjust earmuffs depending on your hairstyle etc. I love having the faux fur on the inside; keeps my ears really warm. They're very cute and stylish, and not too bulky. Will probably buy another pair in another color before the winter is over :) I got the khaki color originally and it's very cute and goes with everything. Will probably try out the pink ones next.
customer_reviews.author: Fleamarketshopper

customer_reviews.text: Got these for my outside snowy elopement & they were perfect! Fit good, adjustable length, and kept my ears warm the whole time which was most important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle JM.

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy but soft
customer_reviews.text: These were so uncomfortable and look awful. They're super soft though. I donated them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cute
customer_reviews.text: I have worn ear muffs for years with my short hair and had been searching for new ones when my mother requested ear muffs for her 89th birthday. I was happy to find these adjustable ones which are oh-so warm because the "fur" is on the inside. I have had compliments from teens and older folks and my mom likes hers, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Toasty!!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with these earmuffs, they're very comfortable and keep my ears super toasty. They're also a perfect fit for my head size. The quality seems good as well. My toddler started playing around with them while I wasn't looking and they withstood the 'toddlerstouch' test, therefore they should be pretty sturdy and long lasting. I'll probably get 2 more pairs for my children.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessRofAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Not what i wanted not going bother sending them back...freaking hurt and squeeze my head...junk....and no i dont have a big head
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good earmuffs but big.
customer_reviews.text: The color matches my daughter's coat perfectly. A lot bigger than I thought. They completely cover both sides of my daughter's head, which isn't a bad thing. It keeps her warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Aramat

customer_reviews.title: They add just the perfect warmth to comfort my ear aches
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are perfectly made and attractive. The only thing that prevented me from a 5 star rating is that they are tight on my head. I wear earmuffs all the time and most of the year because of an inner ear disease. They add just the perfect warmth to comfort my ear aches. I wish they were a little bit looser as I have to take them off after a short time.
customer_reviews.author: mary mitten

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft warm!
customer_reviews.text: These hard to find ear muffs are so warm and lovely and are well made. I love the faux furry ear part, and they are so soft and warm too, especially when you first have to run out to crank the car in the cold mornings! They make you feel warm all over somehow. Also hand wash/dry great too. I'm ordering another pair. I get lots of compliments on them too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Not as plush and soft as they look and are pretty hard and flimsy. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rogan Chipotle

customer_reviews.title: You can clearly hear with them on!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought they were cheap, but realized (in my opinion) they are built for warmth AND the ability to hear clearly with them on. I've had a couple ear infections all ready this year and they are light weight and warm! I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: CincyTheK

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a Christmas present for my sister-in-law. She loved them their looks but do not know if she has had a chance to actually use them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good Winter Deal
customer_reviews.text: Good ear warmers, especially for the price. Since the size is adjustable, if you move it a lot from more open to less open then the fabric starts to come a little loose where the band meets the muffs, but not super noticeable and can't complain for the price point. I would recommend them. They don't look cheap and cover my entire ears and keep them warm. I would say I have slight above average size ears in terms of size. I live in New England and they do the job, although I am never outside for extended periods of time I say the warmth factor is a win.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shilo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: These are just lovely. They are adjustable, not a ton, but some, and they fit nice and snug. The color was almost exactly what the picture looked like ( I got the blue snowflakes) they feel sturdy and well made. I haven't worn them for extended periods of time, I imagine anything could hurt after wearing it for a while but so far these haven't been an issue. I love how I can keep my ears warm even with all my curly hair action which usually makes it hard to fit hats on 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Ear muffs are so hard to find these days , these were bought as a gift for my step mom. She suffers earaches in cold weather & ear muffs protect her. These are absolutely perfect for her , she stated they are comfortable & gives her the protection for her ears that she needs
customer_reviews.author: evette richardsTop Contributor: True Crime Books

customer_reviews.title: fits a 12 year old
customer_reviews.text: my daughter needed earmuffs because her ears get cold easily and I was curious if we should get them or not. we did and they are perfect and do their job I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love it. At first I thought one side was shorter than the other, but once you adjust it, it's good. it's super soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Used for my wedding
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old just had to have some cute ear muffs for my wedding and these fit the bill. They were the perfect colors and kept her little ears warm!
customer_reviews.author: Krystalynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and extremely cute! These are adjustable so they will fit kids, teens, and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect earmuffs. Very comfortable and warm - wore them when it was 21 degrees and very windy. Just love them!
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Good product, keeps ears warm
customer_reviews.text: Good product for good price. It keeps ears warm, it is soft and furry. Looks nice. The fur doesn't shed. It looks stylish as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aashna Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I loved these! These kept my ears extremely warm during my cold vacation never did I ever complain about my ears being cold and I love how they are adjustable. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Cute cheap muffs
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect and are adjustable for any head size. Mine is tiny so I was surprised they fit so well. Material is soft and doesn’t scratch and have not broken yet
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Cute ear muffs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my trip to Seattle recently. Great purchase! The ear muffs come in a variety of different colors/patterns - I ordered the taupe color and it looks exactly like it does online. The fur was bright white and soft (to my surprise) and you are also able to adjust the ear muffs (bigger, smaller to fit your head). Certainly kept my ears warm and excited to use them again!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: The large, very soft and warm earmuffs allows it to fit any size head. Made very well. Look great.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: These are warm and comfortable and just the right amount of adjustable to get ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I was nervous that the whte fluff would tickle the insides of my ears but that's not happened. These are warm and comfortable and just the right amount of adjustable to get them correctly positioned. They seem hurriedly assembled though; I deducted a star for the star pattern being askew on both sides. I'm happy with them but have been surprised that no one has commented. I wonder that perhaps I look like I picked these up in the tween girls' department.
customer_reviews.author: kazbo

customer_reviews.title: these hurt!
customer_reviews.text: too tight on my ears....I can barely make it from my car in the parking lot to my building at work...really uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: A. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Nice for small heads
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are attractive, and they are nice and soft. The problem is they "adjust" very minimally, and really only fit a very small adult head. They would be fine for older kids, and I ended up giving these to my 13 year old granddaughter. I have an average head size, but they left the bottom of my ears exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yo daughter LOVES her earmuffs. She said it was the best thing she got for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Alice Sicher

customer_reviews.title: Great Earmuffs!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! They didn't want to wear hats anymore because most kids hats come with a ball on the top. They wanted warm earmuffs. These are adjustable for different size heads. Colors are true to the pictures. My kids are 9 and 7 and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: MNMom

customer_reviews.title: Definitely keeps ears warm
customer_reviews.text: Daughter felt that she couldn't get them not to be slightly lop sided and that they were a little snug. I have worn them and found them fairly comfortable and so thick I barely can hear through them. Definitely keeps ears warm. Pretty
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and Practical ear muffs, womens.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves these ear muffs, after reading all the comments and searching for good ones I saw these and purchased them for my wife. She Loves these and they stay put and keep her ears warm, even in high windy snowy conditions, here in the Northern Michigan winter. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Puffy Ear Muffs
customer_reviews.text: These look like they have a lot of padding over the wire that fits around the ears but the puffy white furry area is misleading. They are no softer than any other ear muff. Since I wear glasses I was hoping for something that would not grind the temple pieces into the bony area behind the ear but these are just as uncomfortable as any other I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: B. LaChance

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been wearing them everywhere since Santa brought them, and she is even remembering to bring them home. Some people had mentioned that there was some ability to adjust size, but I didn't really find this to be true. However, I was able to wear them comfortably and so was my eight year old daughter. I'm not sure how long they will last, but they are cute and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia L.

customer_reviews.title: "Wonderful and cute" says the wife :-)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my wife for her morning walks in what can be a pretty chilly climate. She wanted something "warm but cute" - and this is what I picked, and she really likes them!! They fit perfectly - not too tight, not too much sound isolation, and just the right "warmth" for our climate near Seattle.... I think they look really good on her... very cute indeed!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave from Tacoma

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ur ear warm , kinda big
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfy but too big and it looks weird on my face. Not sure if it wud be the same for eveyone 😁
customer_reviews.author: Preethi Mani

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it's so comfy and soft
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it's so comfy and soft. I even used it in my costume on Halloween. However, you need a roundish head for this, you can't have a large head or it won't fit. It does tend to hurt the ears slightly, if you wear them for too too long, but it's to be expected, almost like if you wore headphones for too long, it tends to hurt or ache rather. But other than that, if you have a small head, you'll be able to fit this just fine. (i'm 22)
customer_reviews.author: Kat Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Buy These!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and feels so nice when wearing it! Definitely keeps your ears warm and stays in place all day.I got the gray and it compliments my blonde hair. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amcooper2006

customer_reviews.title: VERY tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a small head and it barely fits on me
customer_reviews.author: Luiza Farber

customer_reviews.title: Super Warm!
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are so soft, warm & adjustable. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Philly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Tight fitting
customer_reviews.text: These look nice and do the job of keeping my ears warm, but they are rather tight fitting (and I have a small head). I'm sure I would get a headache if I wore them for longer than 30-45 min.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: This is our second pair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter after buying myself a pair and loving them. We both wore them all over England and they were comfortable and warm. We got many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: H. Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Fits perfect and they are so cute! I get lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: No more cold ears in the wintertime! These fit great and are comfortable. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and adorable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these earmuffs several years ago at 3x the price. Always loved the warmth of the soft muffs and adjustability of the head band. Was delighted to see them again for such a bargain. Still pleased with product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: music4migi

customer_reviews.title: Cute! May be cold outside but warms ears
customer_reviews.text: Cute, Warm & Comfortable! Definitely keeps my ears warm and the winds too. Goes with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L.

customer_reviews.title: The color and fit are good.
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and attractive. They can be adjusted by pulling on the ear muff piece.
customer_reviews.author: EllenT

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are super super cute and comfortable. They also come in handy as ear plugs (I've worn these at night while bf is snoring -- worked wonders). Only downside is they're a tiny bit itchy, but since the actual fur inside isn't rough in the least, I'm chalking the itchiness up to my own skin sensitivity rather than a fault with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are adjustable! The only thing I don’t care for, is when the for gets into my ears. They are super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Theodex

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable, one size fits all??
customer_reviews.text: I knew before ordering that these earmuffs were one size fits all and were not adjustable, but they seem too large for a good fit. I do have a small head with short hair, so maybe this has a lot to do with the fit. I can wear them, but there is a gap between the band and my head. I can wear them without them falling off ,and they keep my ears warm, but wish they fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Candie MG

customer_reviews.title: Love these muffs
customer_reviews.text: Love these muffs, keeps ears toasty and they don't stick out so far that they look weird. Very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: CJ , MD,USA

customer_reviews.title: They Go With Everything!
customer_reviews.text: One of our granddaughters (7) doesn't like wearing hats so I thought these would work for her and they do!
customer_reviews.author: Savivi

customer_reviews.title: Toasty warm
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, and keep my ears toasty warm. I don't like hats on me. Used them a lot this winter so far, as we've had more than our share of cold and lots of snow here in Idaho. I do recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Connie J Van Steeter

customer_reviews.title: Look as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the dark grey snowflake kind. These look as pictured but something is off with the fitting. One side looks bigger than the other. They are adjustable. They’ll get the job done tho.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Blume

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for online shoppers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this muffs primarily because other reviewers have noted how they are adjustable. And they are! Very useful for online shoppers. The muffs are very comfortable and very warm. The army green color is muted, and can definitely go with any outfit. Unfortunately, you cannot fold them to a more compact size, but that's a bonus I can live without. For the price, this is definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Yanie

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I love these ear muffs! They cover my whole ear, are a little adjustable, and keep me very warm. If I had to change anything it’d be that the fur is white. I personally try to avoid white because after time it starts to look dirty
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty comfortable for short periods of time at least
customer_reviews.text: These keep my ears very warm and don't slip off. They are pretty comfortable for short periods of time at least. Very good buy for the price and they also look very cute !
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but a little small
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but is too tight around my head, even with the adjustable headband. I think it would give me a headache if I wore it for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Piper3270

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best!! I bought them to wear at school when I'm standing outside doing bus duty and they keep my ears toasty warm even in below zero wind chills. They're very comfortable to wear and they don't hurt my ears. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer557

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Hard as a rock and not comfortable at all. They may be cute but feel awful
customer_reviews.author: Amber Love

customer_reviews.title: Great for small heads.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought these. I have a hard time finding earmuffs that fit my small head from the top to my ears. These fit perfectly. They're not foldable or adjustable, but I just hang them around the strap of my purse when I come in from the cold.
customer_reviews.author: A Music Fan

customer_reviews.title: Can't survive a winter without these!!
customer_reviews.text: These have gotten me through 6 years of cold winters in Boston. They keep your cheeks and ears warm even in cold wind. And after so many years they still look like new! Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: B Sung

customer_reviews.title: Good Size
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a neighbor who walks our dog - perfect size for her, since it's not huge like many others are now
customer_reviews.author: Ann Laird

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit, but I like that.
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs have an adjustable headband and are snug on the ears, which I like. I do have a small to normal women's head size. I haven't tried to clean them, but I wouldn't expect to just through them in washer and dryer. For $10, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S Bergeson

customer_reviews.title: Overall They Are OK
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the the ear warmers look. I wish the flat part that fits against my ears was a tad concave with a bit more fluff. That would improve the comfort and warmth level tremendously. The adjustable band is perfect. I will wear these this winter when I need an extra layer of warmth. I won't buy another pair unless they make the changes I suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Jadah

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves These!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my granddaughter - who turned out to LOVE them! I'm so glad. She is studying in New England, and I thought she might need some ear protection. When the weather turns cold, she wears them all the time. Most gratifying.
customer_reviews.author: Eliz-R

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are freaking adorable. They are knit and just stretchy enough that at their longest setting they still look cool. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Dysonrules

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and strength!
customer_reviews.text: Only wrong thing I have about this is how hot my ears get. But I sweat easily anyways. At least the muffs is doing its job. And it looks cute and sturdy. Plus it’s adjustable!
customer_reviews.author: ismael

customer_reviews.title: Nice and fits comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Well made, comfortable, and looks nice on. Inlike that I can adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: PammieK

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ears warm, but needs a better design
customer_reviews.text: As you can see in the product photo, one side is longer than the other, so when you place them on your ears, the longer side sticks out from your head more. They keep my ears warm, but look kinda odd and a little bit cheap. Also, they're just a bit tight, so it would be nice if the grip were adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: T.Barker

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and super warm. Thought I would be getting crap but that was not the case. I have a long head so finding muffs that fit and are cute is a challenge. This however did just that. No chemical smell for me and no loose string. Didn't regret the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: very warm
customer_reviews.text: takes a while to break them in so they dont push on your head too much but once broken in, they are great
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: the earmuffs aren't as large as I would like. I bought these because I was in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I'd hoped for. The headband does not adjust and I thought I saw a review that said it did. Also, the earmuffs aren't as large as I would like. I bought these because I was in a bind (lost my old ones and the temp was plummeting) and they will do for the remainder of the winter, but I wouldn't recommend them. They are also VERY TIGHT. I wear glasses and when I put these things on, my glasses are almost askew. I hope they loosen up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.text: Soft warm and extremely fuzzy.. I absolutely love them!! I'm very disappointed because I lost them roughly 4 days after I got them😢. (They didn't take long at all to get to my house) I'm going to order these exact same ones though!! Probably have to wait til Christmas is over but I look forward to having these back in my possession😀. More then worth it for the price as well! Promise you won't be wasting your money!
customer_reviews.author: Madolyn M.

customer_reviews.title: You will look cute. Your friends will be jealous.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I look adorable in these. And I'm a fully grown adult. But seriously, I can't stop looking at myself because, ADORABLE. They're also comfortable and do their job. I've started wearing these every day, and my ears are nice and toasty. And did I mention a-d-o-r-a-b-l-e? Because they are.
customer_reviews.author: La Cinema

customer_reviews.title: I love these - warm and nice and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I"ve had these for over a year now and wore them last Winter. I love them. They keep my ears warm and no "hat hair"!!! I also like the fact that they are stylish and go with my Black down-filled jackets. Makes a wonderful Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Reenee

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and SO warm!
customer_reviews.text: I love these earmuffs! I buy a new pair every couple years because I like them so much. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for smaller heads
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought a different pair of earmuffs that were HUGE on my head. These fit perfectly! I may just buy them in other colors
customer_reviews.author: Lee/Shea

customer_reviews.title: Fit very nicely.... super warm and CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY CUTE!!! These are soft and warm. They fit nicely on myself, my 8 year old, and my 5 year old. They adjust to fit bigger or smaller. Price is great; shipping only took 3 days. I just might be back for more colors... great deal!!! My girls LOVE them and look super cute. :) A+++
customer_reviews.author: Mamabb18Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Super nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: It fits super snug, but not too tight! Can't use headphones with them though and they are not really adjustable. You can move the ones I have (green) up like a quarter of an inch. They are comfortable and warm. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Parker

product_meta.title: Simplicity Women's Winter Knitted Faux Fur Plush Earmuffs w/Lined Trim
feature_bullets: Material: Outer is a soft knit material, inner lining is plush furry texture material, keep warm, protect your ear.
Cute knit design, stylish pure color, lovely headband, Fashion simple type, for all occasions and wears, Well built, no worry about distorting
Wraps around the back or top of your head, No pressure of moving glasses, no worry about messing your hair
Perfect for cold winter casual, skiing travel and other winter outdoor activities, seam sealed, keep moisture and wind out. Great gift for family and friends for Christmas or Festival.
Available in various colors & styles; Great selection for all occasions and can be worn with beanies, hats, glasses, and helmets; Hand wash cold/Do not bleach/Hang dry
